children.value: By default, Hummingbot uses the default fees of the exchange. However, if you're on a VIP level getting discounts on fees, you can override this by editing the
directory, depending on your installation method.

is the default name of the parent directory. This can be different depending on the setup
when the instance was created.

<Callout
  type="note"
  body="Exit and restart Hummingbot for the changes to take effect."
/>
